== Keekan (CT) (627168) ==

Keekan (CT) is a town in the [[Hosdurg]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 4.48 sq. km. and harbouring 1831 households with total population of 9735 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 542 km. Male population is 4435 and female population is 5300. Scheduled Caste population is 26 and Scheduled Tribes population is 26. Census Location Code of the town is 627168<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 7 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 151 km. Railway station is at Pallikkara at a distance of 5 km.
